metadata.title: CVE-2023-41175 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in libtiff due to multiple potential integeroverflows in raw2tiff.c. This flaw allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service or possibly execute an arbitrary code via a crafted tiffimage, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
